about_the_game: A simple funny 2D couch game to play with up to 9 friends! Players will compete with their friends online in minigames where the last one to survive wins, these involve surviving lasers, racing against each other in obstacles and avoiding falling platforms. When a player wins a minigame they will have an opportunity to roll a dice and move their piece on the board forward, but be careful as there are some bad tiles that can be landed on and arm your chances of winning! Enjoy competing to reach the end of the board first through winning minigames whilst sabotaging your friends to increase your odds! Once one player reaches the end the game is over and they win! Best played with many friends for a good time!

Enjoy competing to reach the end of the board first through winning minigames whilst sabotaging your friends to increase your odds! Once one player reaches the end the game is over and they win! Best played with many friends for a good time!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.4 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core Processor I5-3470
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A

name: The Ultimate Couch Game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core Processor I5-3470
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GT 730 2GB
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • VR Support: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Very easy to run
